name: The Magnificient Short
description:
A online multiplayer deahtmatch game set in a sci fi setting.

Run around and upgrade your weapon. Gather points to get the topscore!

Controls:

  • W,A,S,D or arrow keys to move
  • Left Mouse Button to shoot
  • Right Mouse Button to zoom
  • Hold Left Shift to sprint
  • R to reload
  • E to interact
  • F to toggle light

Points:

  • shooting an ai enemy gains you 25 points
  • shooting an enemy player gains you 10% of their points
  • holding the container generates you 15 points per second

Upgrades:
there are 4 slots for upgrades (Main, Power, Utility & Special)

The game was made in the month of may for the Multiplayer Kajam
